trans-unit.source: Ensures that the host does not exists, eventually deletes host.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the host exists, eventually creates new host. NOTE: please use argument visible_name instead of name to not mess with name from salt sls. This function accepts all standard host properties: keyword argument names differ depending on your zabbix version, see: https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/2.4/manual/api/reference/host/object#host
trans-unit.target: 确保主机存在，最终创建新主机。注意：请使用参数visible_name而不是name，以免与salt sls的名称混淆。此函数接受所有标准主机属性：关键字参数名称因您的zabbix版本而异，请参见：https : //www.zabbix.com/documentation/2.4/manual/api/reference/host/object#host

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the host group does not exist, eventually delete host group.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the host group exists, eventually creates new host group.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机组存在,最终创建新的主机组。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the hostname is set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 确保主机名被设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the keystone project exists Alias for tenant_present from V2 API to fulfill V3 API naming convention.
trans-unit.target: 确保V2 API中tenant_present的别名存在,以满足V3 API的命名惯例。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the keystone tenant exists
trans-unit.target: 确保关键租户的存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the logging levels are set on the device. The logging levels must match the following options: emergency, alert, critical, error, warning, notice, informational, debug.
trans-unit.target: 确保在设备上设置日志级别。日志等级必须与以下选项相匹配:紧急、警报、关键、错误、警告、通知、信息、调试。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the mediatype does not exist, eventually deletes the mediatype.
trans-unit.target: 确保mediatype不存在,最终删除mediatype。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named DNS record is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的DNS记录不存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named DNS record is present with the given ttl.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的DNS记录以给定的ttl存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named alias is present with the given target or list of targets. If the alias exists but the target differs from the previous entry, the target(s) will be overwritten. If the alias does not exist, the alias will be created.
trans-unit.target: 确保指定的目标或目标列表中存在命名的别名。如果别名存在,但目标与之前的条目不同,则目标将被覆盖。如果别名不存在,将创建别名。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named bridge does not exist, eventually deletes it.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的网桥不存在,最终将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named bridge exists, eventually creates it.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名桥的存在,最终创建它。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named command is not running.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的命令没有运行。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named configmap is absent from the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的configmap不在指定的命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named configmap is present inside of the specified namespace with the given data. If the configmap exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保被命名的configmap存在于指定的命名空间中。如果configmap存在,它将被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named deployment is absent from the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的部署不在指定的命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named deployment is present inside of the specified namespace with the given metadata and spec. If the deployment exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的部署存在于指定的命名空间中,并具有给定的元数据和规格。如果部署存在,则会被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named host is present with the given ip
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的主机在给定的IP下存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named label is absent from the node.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名标签不在节点中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named label is set on the named node with the given value. If the label exists it will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 确保在命名的节点上设置给定值的命名标签。如果标签存在,将被替换。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named namespace is absent.
trans-unit.target: 确保没有命名的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named namespace is present.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名空间存在。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named pod is absent from the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 确保命名的 pod 不在给定的命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named pod is present inside of the specified namespace with the given metadata and spec. If the pod exists it will be replaced.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named port exists on bridge, eventually deletes it. If bridge is not set, port is removed from whatever bridge contains it.
trans-unit.target: 确保指定的 port 存在于 bridge 上,并最终将其删除。如果桥接没有设置,则端口会从包含它的桥接中被删除。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named service is present inside of the specified namespace with the given metadata and spec. If the deployment exists it will be replaced.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the named service is unmasked

trans-unit.source: Ensures the given password is set on the ESXi host. Passwords cannot be obtained from host, so if a password is set in this state, the vsphere.update_host_password function will always run (except when using test=True functionality) and the state's changes dictionary will always be populated.
trans-unit.target: 确保在ESXi主机上设置了给定的密码。无法从主机获取密码，因此，如果在此状态下设置了密码，则将始终运行 vsphere.update_host_password 函数（使用test = True功能时除外），并且将始终填充该状态的更改字典。

trans-unit.source: Even though Augeas knows that /etc/redis/redis.conf is a Redis configuration file and knows how to parse it, it is recommended to specify the lens anyway. This is because by default, Augeas loads all known lenses and their associated file paths. All these files are parsed when Augeas is loaded, which can take some time. When specifying a lens, Augeas is loaded with only that lens, which speeds things up quite a bit.
trans-unit.target: 即使Augeas知道 /etc/redis/redis.conf 是Redis配置文件并且知道如何解析它，仍然建议始终指定镜头。这是因为默认情况下，Augeas会加载所有已知的镜头及其关联的文件路径。加载Augeas时将解析所有这些文件，这可能需要一些时间。指定镜头时，Augeas仅装载该镜头，这可以使速度大大提高。

trans-unit.source: Exposes all "real-time" events from Salt's event bus on a websocket connection. It should be noted that "Real-time" here means these events are made available to the server as soon as any salt related action (changes to minions, new jobs etc) happens. Clients are however assumed to be able to tolerate any network transport related latencies. Functionality provided by this endpoint is similar to the /events end point.
trans-unit.target: 通过websocket连接从Salt的事件总线公开 all “实时”事件。应该注意的是，这里的“实时”是指一旦发生任何与盐有关的动作（更改奴才，新工作等），这些事件就可用于服务器。但是，假定客户端能够容忍任何与网络传输相关的延迟。该端点提供的功能类似于 /events 端点。

trans-unit.source: Exposes formatted "real-time" events from Salt's event bus on a websocket connection. It should be noted that "Real-time" here means these events are made available to the server as soon as any salt related action (changes to minions, new jobs etc) happens. Clients are however assumed to be able to tolerate any network transport related latencies. Functionality provided by this endpoint is similar to the /events end point.
trans-unit.target: 通过Websocket连接从Salt的事件总线中公开 formatted “实时”事件。应该注意的是，这里的“实时”是指一旦发生任何与盐有关的动作（更改奴才，新工作等），这些事件就可用于服务器。但是，假定客户端能够容忍任何与网络传输相关的延迟。该端点提供的功能类似于 /events 端点。

trans-unit.source: Finally, a Requisite declaration object with its Requisite reference's can be created by invoking one of the requisite methods (see State Requisites) on either a Function declaration object or a State declaration object. The return value of a requisite call is also a Function declaration object, so you can chain several requisite calls together.
trans-unit.target: 最后，所需的声明与它的对象必需参考的可通过调用的必要方法之一来创建（见国要件）任一个上函数声明对象或状态声明对象。必需调用的返回值也是函数声明对象，因此可以将多个必需调用链接在一起。

trans-unit.source: Finally, add this bot user to a channel by switching to the channel and using /invite @mybotuser. Keep in mind that this engine will process messages from each channel in which the bot is a member, so it is recommended to narrowly define the commands which can be executed, and the Slack users which are allowed to run commands.
trans-unit.target: 最后，通过切换到频道并使用 /invite @mybotuser 将该机器人用户添加到频道。请记住，此引擎将处理来自该机器人所属成员的每个通道的消息，因此建议狭义地定义可以执行的命令以及允许运行命令的Slack用户。

trans-unit.source: Finally, if you pass the queries in via a mapping, the key will be the first level name where as passing them in as a list will place them in the root. This isolates the query results into their own subtrees. This may be a help or hindrance to your aims and can be used as such.
trans-unit.target: 最后,如果你通过映射传入查询,键将是第一层的名称,而以列表的形式传入则将它们放在根目录下。这就将查询结果隔离到他们自己的子树中。这对你的目标可能是一种帮助,也可能是一种阻碍,可以这样使用。

trans-unit.source: Finally, ports database updates are always handled with

trans-unit.source: Finally, with the use of this feature, it becomes possible to easily make an included sls file execute all its states after some state (say, with id X) in the including sls file. All you have to do is to make state, X, require_in the first state defined in the included sls file.

trans-unit.source: Following JBoss documentation (https://developer.jboss.org/wiki/CommandLineInterface): "Operations are considered a low level but comprehensive way to manage the AS controller, i.e. if it can't be done with operations it can't be done in any other way. Commands, on the other hand, are more user-friendly in syntax, although most of them still translate into operation requests and some of them even into a few composite operation requests, i.e. commands also simplify some management operations from the user's point of view."
trans-unit.target: 遵循JBoss文档（https://developer.jboss.org/wiki/CommandLineInterface）：“操作被认为是管理AS控制器的低级但全面的方法，即，如果无法通过操作来完成，则不能另一方面，命令在语法上更加人性化，尽管大多数命令仍然可以转换为操作请求，而某些命令甚至可以转换为一些复合操作请求，即命令还简化了一些管理操作，用户的观点。”

Additionally, verify_options can be used to modify further the behavior of pkg.verify. See examples below. Currently, this option is supported for the following pkg providers: yumpkg.

trans-unit.source: For weighted (but not weighted alias) resource record sets, if you set Weight to 0 for a resource record set, Amazon Route 53 never responds to queries with the applicable value for that resource record set. However, if you set Weight to 0 for all resource record sets that have the same combination of DNS name and type, traffic is routed to all resources with equal probability. The effect of setting Weight to 0 is different when you associate health checks with weighted resource record sets. For more information, see Options for Configuring Amazon Route 53 Active-Active and Active-Passive Failover in the Amazon Route 53 Developer Guide.
trans-unit.target: 对于加权（但不是加权别名）资源记录集，如果您将资源记录集的Weight设置为0，则Amazon Route 53将永远不会使用该资源记录集的适用值来响应查询。但是，如果将具有相同DNS名称和类型组合的所有资源记录集的“权重”设置为0，则流量将以相同的概率路由到所有资源。将运行状况检查与加权资源记录集关联时，将“权重”设置为0的效果会有所不同。有关更多信息，请参阅Amazon Route 53开发人员指南中的用于配置Amazon Route 53主动-主动和主动-被动故障转移的选项。

trans-unit.source: For weighted (but not weighted alias) resource record sets, if you set Weight to 0 for a resource record set, Amazon Route 53 never responds to queries with the applicable value for that resource record set. However, if you set Weight to 0 for all resource record sets that have the same combination of DNS name and type, traffic is routed to all resources with equal probability. The effect of setting Weight to 0 is different when you associate health checks with weighted resource record sets. For more information, see Options for Configuring Amazon Route 53 Active-Active and Active-Passive Failover in the Amazon Route 53 Developer Guide.
trans-unit.target: 对于加权（但不是加权别名）资源记录集，如果您将资源记录集的Weight设置为0，则Amazon Route 53永远不会使用该资源记录集的适用值来响应查询。但是，如果将具有相同DNS名称和类型组合的所有资源记录集的“权重”设置为0，则流量将以相同的概率路由到所有资源。将运行状况检查与加权资源记录集相关联时，将“权重”设置为0的效果会有所不同。有关更多信息，请参阅Amazon Route 53开发人员指南中的用于配置Amazon Route 53主动-主动和主动-被动故障转移的选项。

trans-unit.source: Force a server's administrative state to a new state. This can be useful to disable load balancing and/or any traffic to a server. Setting the state to "ready" puts the server in normal mode, and the command is the equivalent of the "enable server" command. Setting the state to "maint" disables any traffic to the server as well as any health checks. This is the equivalent of the "disable server" command. Setting the mode to "drain" only removes the server from load balancing but still allows it to be checked and to accept new persistent connections. Changes are propagated to tracking servers if any.
trans-unit.target: 将服务器的管理状态强制到一个新的状态。这对于禁用负载均衡和/或任何服务器的流量是很有用的。将状态设置为 "ready "会使服务器处于正常模式,该命令相当于 "enable server "命令。将状态设置为 "maint "则会禁用服务器的任何流量以及任何健康检查。这相当于 "禁用服务器 "命令。将模式设置为 "drain "只是将服务器从负载均衡中移除,但仍允许其接受检查并接受新的持久连接。如果有变化,会传播到跟踪服务器。

trans-unit.source: GPG key generation requires a lot of entropy and randomness. Difficult to do over a remote connection, consider having another process available which is generating randomness for the machine. Also especially difficult on virtual machines, consider the rng-tools package.
trans-unit.target: GPG密钥生成需要大量的熵和随机性。很难通过远程连接进行操作，请考虑使用另一个可为计算机生成随机性的过程。在虚拟机上也特别困难，请考虑使用rng-tools软件包。

trans-unit.source: Geo location resource record sets only. A dict that lets you control how Route 53 responds to DNS queries based on the geographic origin of the query. For example, if you want all queries from Africa to be routed to a web server with an IP address of 192.0.2.111, create a resource record set with a Type of A and a ContinentCode of AF.
trans-unit.target: 仅用于地理位置资源记录集。可让您根据查询的地理来源控制Route 53如何响应DNS查询的指令。例如,如果您希望将所有来自非洲的查询路由到 IP 地址为 192.0.2.111 的 Web 服务器,请创建一个资源记录集,其类型为 A,ContinentCode 为 AF。

trans-unit.source: GeoLocation
trans-unit.target: GeoLocation

trans-unit.source: GeoTrust
trans-unit.target: GeoTrust

trans-unit.source: Geolocation works by mapping IP addresses to locations. However, some IP addresses aren't mapped to geographic locations, so even if you create geolocation resource record sets that cover all seven continents, Amazon Route 53 will receive some DNS queries from locations that it can't identify. We recommend that you create a resource record set for which the value of CountryCode is *, which handles both queries that come from locations for which you haven't created geolocation resource record sets and queries from IP addresses that aren't mapped to a location. If you don't create a * resource record set, Amazon Route 53 returns a "no answer" response for queries from those locations.
trans-unit.target: 地理位置通过将IP地址映射到位置来工作。但是，某些IP地址未映射到地理位置，因此，即使您创建覆盖所有七个大洲的地理位置资源记录集，Amazon Route 53也会从无法识别的位置接收一些DNS查询。我们建议您创建一个资源记录集，其CountryCode的值为 * ，这样既可以处理来自尚未创建地理位置资源记录集的位置的查询，也可以处理来自未映射到某个位置的IP地址的查询。如果您不创建 * 资源记录集，则Amazon Route 53对于来自那些位置的查询将返回“ no answer”响应。
